meanings.definition: Twisted or curled into a ring or spiral shape.
meanings.sent1: The wreathed vines climbed up the trellis.
meanings.sent2: Her hair was wreathed with colorful ribbons.
meanings.sent3: The wreathed pretzel looked too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: The wreathed clouds painted a beautiful sunset sky.
meanings.sent5: The wreathed pattern on the rug added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.sent1: The wreathed garden gate welcomed visitors with its floral design.
meanings.sent2: The wreathed statue stood proudly in the center of the square.
meanings.sent3: The wreathed cake was a delicious centerpiece at the party.
meanings.sent4: The wreathed city was a sight to behold from the hilltop.
meanings.sent5: The wreathed necklace sparkled around her neck, catching the sunlight.
